synopsis.text: Kyuuseishu, a captivating melody by Tsukuyomi, takes center stage in its official music video, directed by the talented Gko. This enchanting tune serves a dual purpose, not only standing alone as a musical masterpiece, but also setting the tone for the anime series "The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen: From Villainess to Savior." As the opening theme, Kyuuseishu perfectly encapsulates the essence of the anime, enticing viewers to delve into the intriguing world of its heretical last boss queen.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
